title: Saw
creator_credit: Twisted Pictures, Evolution Entertainment, Saw Productions Inc., Lionsgate, James Wan, Leigh Whannell, Mark Burg, Gregg Hoffman, Oren Koules, Jennifer L. Soulages and Julie Berghoff
brief_description: Obsessed with teaching his victims the value of life, a deranged, sadistic serial killer abducts the morally wayward. Once captured, they must face impossible choices in a horrific game of survival. The victims must fight to win their lives back, or die trying…

constellations_other.name: Australians on the world stage
constellations_other.description: George Miller’s Mad Max revolutionised movies when it tore through cinemas in 1979. Max Rockatansky’s journey dispensing justice across the wasteland in his V8 Interceptor became a cult classic and catapulted Australian cinema onto the world stage.
